legal_basis: Rule 466(b) of the Federal Courts Rules
applicable_statute: interim injunction prohibiting unauthorized decoding and use of trademarked materials

legal_basis: Rule 466(b) of the Federal Courts Rules
evidence_credibility: deliberate actions post-order, including enhanced operations
procedural_fairness: Court issued a show-cause order, reviewed evidence
impact_of_delay_or_conditions: fined, ordered to pay costs, and one faced imprisonment unless compliance was achieved
